title: Join our webinars to learn about vet visit funding for multiple herds and flocks
categories: Payments to support animal health and welfare

content.text: Farmers in England can now get funding for vet visits for each of their herds or flocks of the same species.
This includes Animal Health and Welfare Reviews as well as follow-up visits for endemic diseases, offered through the Get Funding to Improve Animal Health and Welfare service.
This means that if you manage several groups of cattle, pigs or sheep, you can now get support across your business – not just for a single herd or flock.
To help you learn more about this offer, we’re holding 2 webinars this month.
You’ll learn more about how to apply, what’s included in a funded visit, and how it can support your business.
We’ll explain how the Animal Health and Welfare Review works and how it has been expanded to offer more support.
There will be time for questions.
Sheep farmers Wednesday 16 July 3pm to 4pm Sign up to the sheep farmer webinar on Eventbrite
Pig farmers Thursday 17 July 11am to 12pm Sign up to the pig farmer webinar on Eventbrite
We hope to see you there. If you can’t make it, don’t worry, we’ll share the recordings in this post after each webinar ends.
